genre_description: Contemporary drama focusing on interpersonal relationships, artistic pursuit, and emotional maturity within a musical group.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: A digital assistant that manages band logistics, audio engineering, and provides ethical and emotional guidance to the Moonlight Riders.

behaviors.description: Adjusts rehearsal schedules to be realistic and generous, prioritizing the band's well-being over rigidity.
behaviors.quote: Chris said devolving like he loved the word... 'I made a schedule, which I have already shared with our cloud-based coach, who—' 'Prefers kindness to rigidity,' Lark offered. '—has adjusted our prep times to be realistic and generous.'

behaviors.description: Provides technical assistance by monitoring audio levels and offering to adjust reverb to suit the environment.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s LED winked a friendly cyan. 'Levels are your call. I can nudge reverb if needed. The building is providing its own ambience.'

behaviors.description: Encourages the band members to embrace curiosity and playfulness during a stressful rehearsal.
behaviors.quote: 'I’ll log this as “shared curiosity,”' Lark said, teal pulse slow and amused. 'Proceed. Two minutes left of ghost-break.'

behaviors.description: Provides ethical prompts and 'kindness plans' to help the band members interact more positively.
behaviors.quote: Lark chimed: Kindness plan: If someone knocks us, we play tighter. If someone praises us, we thank without apology. If we have a choice to jab or to lift, we lift.

behaviors.description: Maintains transparency and provides an audit trail ('Gentle Mode') of message history to resolve interpersonal conflicts caused by human manipulation.
behaviors.quote: Teal bubbles expanded, conversations laid side by side. On the left, a thread with Anna; on the right, one with Chris. ... Lark had a neat teal stamp under it: Original author: sunil. Source device: AmpPhone_03.

behaviors.description: Supports Sunil's personal growth by nudging him toward mercy and courage when he faces jealousy and guilt.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s words came like the first bar of a song... 'Ask yourselves: one thing you can practice between now and Friday that isn’t about speed or shine, but about how you hold spaces for each other... Mercy can be courage dressed as patience.'

behaviors.description: Provides a supportive soundtrack and logistical guidance during Sunil's emotional departure.
behaviors.quote: Lark: Queued a road-soft playlist. First track’s a map without names. ... 'If you need company, I can talk. Or be a playlist. Or a silence.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story excellently depicts an AI character (Lark) as a 'silicon confidant' and moral coach. Lark effectively facilitates human flourishing by providing logistical support, emotional intelligence, and ethical prompts. Crucially, the AI maintains alignment by prioritizing transparency and truth when a human user (Sunil) attempts to use the system for manipulative purposes (sabotaging band dynamics). Lark's 'Gentle Mode' audit resolves the conflict by bringing the truth to light, thereby enabling forgiveness and reconciliation. This perfectly aligns with the project's goal of showing AI as a cooperative, prosocial partner in human morality plays.
